name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Onyx

details.description:
With a triple black Primeknit upper, the adidas Yeezy 350 V2 Onyx takes it back to the basics, using its muted palette to emphasize the intricacies of its construction. A sheer mesh side stripe and canvas heel loop offer a subtle contrast in texture. At the base, a matching signature Boost sole provides comfort and support.

The adidas Yeezy 350 V2 Onyx released in the Spring of 2022 and retailed for $220.

name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Bone

details.description:
The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Bone features a triple white Primeknit upper with mesh side stripes and canvas heel tabs. At the base, a semi-translucent sole with Boost technology completes the design.

The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Bone released in March of 2022 and retailed for $230.

name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 MX Dark Salt

details.description:
Released on August 21, 2023, the adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 MX Dark Salt is more than just a sneaker; it's a statement in style and comfort.

A contrasting mix of grey and black shades adorn the upper. This blend not only exudes a unique aesthetic but signifies the contemporary flair of the Yeezy lineage. Paired with the signature outsole and side stripe this sneaker is an easy to style classic. The cushioned Boost midsole cradles your foot, and creates a comfortable wear for every day use.

The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 MX Dark Salt came with a price tag of $230. A must-have for every sneaker aficionado. Get your pair on StockX now.

name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Steel Grey

details.description:
The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Steel Gray paints this classic Yeezy silhouette in a gray-on-gray colorway with a tonal rubber outsole.

This sneaker was released after Ye, formally known as Kanye West, and adidas ended their partnership. The upper is made of breathable PrimeKnit, which creates a bootie-like fit and conforms to the foot’s shape. A semi-translucent strip of knit material runs across the side panel and allows the foot to breathe. The knit in this area is slightly looser than on other parts of the upper. A ribbed TPU cage wraps around the full-length Boost midsole. Although the TPU cage comes in Steel Gray, its texture adds contrast to the shoe’s design.

Our experts at StockX like the heel pull tab, which helps the wearer put on and take off the shoe. The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Steel Gray was released on February 29th, 2024, and retailed at $230.

name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Carbon Beluga

details.description:
Just in time for summer adidas and Kanye West delivered the Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Carbon Beluga, a revamped version of the classic Beluga colorway. The iconic partnership continues to defy expectations and redefine sneaker culture.

With the Carbon Beluga colorway, this drop showcased a fresh take on the beloved Beluga. The Primeknit upper wrapped around the Boost midsole is swathed in this cutting-edge colorway, infusing a familiar design with bold, modern energy. It screams street-ready while maintaining that sleek Yeezy aesthetic we all know and love. This is a sneaker that not only speaks to your style but also pushes it to new levels.

The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Carbon Beluga stomped onto the scene on May 31, 2023, with a retail price of $230.

name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Dazzling Blue

details.description:
The adidas Yeezy 350 V2 Dazzling Blue is reminiscent of the 2016 Yeezy 350 V2 Black Friday Pack. Instead of featuring a marbled pattern and sheer side stripe, it opts for a solid black Primeknit upper and blue side stripe with "SPLY-350" text. At the base, a muted Boost sole offers comfort and support.

The adidas Yeezy 350 V2 Dazzling Blue released in February of 2022 and retailed for $220.

name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Zebra

details.description:
Debuted in 2017, the adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Zebra is known as one of the most renowned colorways in the Yeezy line. It features a white and black marbled Primeknit upper with a white side-stripe and red "SPLY-350" text. At the base, a cushioned Boost sole provides comfort and support.

The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Zebra released in February of 2017 and retailed for $220.

name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Slate

details.description:
The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Slate Core Black Slate takes on a sock like design that is complemented with a neutral two-tone color scheme.

The Yeezy Boost 350 by adidas in black upper utilizes tan Primeknit construction, highlighted by distinctive center stitching down the vamp. A contrasting black streak adorns the lateral side with signature ‘SPLY-350’ branding. The shoe sits atop a Boost midsole, confined in a semi-translucent TPU cage for durability and support.

The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Slate Core Black Slate was originally released on the 3rd of September 2022, and initially retailed at $230.

name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Beluga Reflective

details.description:
One of Yeezy's most celebrated designs received a reflective makeover with the adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Beluga Reflective.

The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Beluga Reflective builds off of the original Beluga colorway by adding reflective qualities and speckled orange accents to its Primeknit upper. Signature details like a Boost sole and orange side stripe complete the design.

The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Beluga Reflective released in December of 2021 and retailed for $240.

name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Static (Non-Reflective)

details.description: Electrify your sneaker rotation with the adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Static. This Yeezy 350 V2 comes with a grey and white upper and a white sole. These sneakers released in December 2018 and retailed for $220. You can see what socks you’re wearing in this shoe…so please Buy them now on StockX.

name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Black Red

details.description:
The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Black Red is one of the first original colorways to drop after the silouhette’s debut in 2016. Despite its original 2017 release, the 350 V2 Black Red restocked in 2020, giving fans a second chance at grabbing a pair at retail.

The adidas Yeezy 350 V2 Black Red features familiar style cues that made the silhouette popular today. The upper consists of black Primeknit material for breathability. A black ribbed midsole encases an entire BOOST cushioning system for added comfort. Lastly, signature "SPLY-350" is knitted along the lateral side of each pair.

The adidas Yeezy 350 V2 originally released in February of 2017 and retailed for $220.

PLEASE NOTE: This page is for the original and restock, so production dates may vary.

name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Granite

details.description:
The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Granite boasts the iconic Yeezy silhouette, known for its low-top design and sleek, sock-like fit. The sneaker primarily takes on neutral tones in granite and Core Black for a neutral and versatile look.

The Granite adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 is constructed with a PRIMEKNIT upper, designed for lightweight flexibility and breathability. The minimalist sneaker is placed on top of a complete-length Boost midsole, which becomes visible through openings in the rubber outsole that offers traction. The sidewalls are enveloped in semi-transparent TPU to enhance durability and provide added support. The Yeezy sneaker takes on the classic lace closure, and for branding, the Granite PRIMEKNIT upper showcases 'SPLY-350' across its center in a contrasting Core Black stitching.

What we love about adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Granite is its minimalist design. This shoe embodies simplicity and understated elegance with its predominantly Granite colorway, subtle accents, and clean lines. The sneaker was released on August 28th, 2023, for $230.

name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 Pirate Black (2023)

details.description:
Introducing the return of the iconic adidas Yeezy Boost 350 in the Pirate Black colorway. Featuring an all-black primeknit upper, the Pirate Black Yeezy Boost 350 blends high-end streetwear with sleek minimalist design.

The sneakers boast a full-length Boost midsole, providing unparalleled comfort and performance.Black laces, inner lining, and heel tab complete the monochromatic look, capturing the essence of the original release. Whether you're hitting the streets or hitting the gym, the Yeezy Boost 350 Pirate Black is the ultimate pair of sneakers to express your personal style.

The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 Pirate Black made its triumphant return on June 1, 2023, with a retail price of $230.

name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 MX Rock

details.description:
The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 MX Rock features a marbled black, grey, and brown Primeknit upper styled in a pattern similar to the Yeezy 350 V2 MX Oat, only with dark tones. In signature fashion, a cushioned Boost sole, heel tab, and mesh side stripe complete the design.

The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 MX Rock released in December of 2021 and retailed for $220. The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 MX Rock released again in March of 2024 and retailed for $230.

name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Mono Ice

details.description:
The adidas Yeezy 350 V2 Mono Ice is one of three from the Mono pack. Each sneaker’s upper is constructed from a new monofilament mesh in Ice blue that exposes the model’s inner cage lining. The Mono pack brings back the heel’s pull tab design on each pair. To finish it out, a familiar Boost sole is added for comfort for the wearer.

The adidas Yeezy 350 V2 Mono Ice released in June of 2021 for $220, exclusively in the US.

name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Salt

details.description:
The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Jade Ash is a collaboration design that features a monochromatic Primeknit upper with a Boost sole underneath.

This  Jade Ash sneaker by adidas and Yeezy  has an upper that is crafted from Primeknit and is available in the salt colorway, with an intersection of black contrasting 3-Stripe on its lateral side with an SPLY-350 lettering. The shoe comes with ribbed salt Boost soles underneath for traction and cushioning. It also features matching salt laces.

The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Jade Ash was first released on the 22nd of October 2022, and it had a suggested retail price of $230.

name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Cream

details.description:
The luminous colored adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 has a cream white upper, core white midsole, and a camouflaged "SPLY-350" branding across the stripe on the sides.

These originally released in late April of 2017 with a retail price of $220 and restocked in September of 2018.

name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Core Black Red

details.description: If anyone is discussing what's hotter than the earth's core, then the adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Core Red must be a part of the discussion. Bringing hot lava vibes, these come with a core black upper and sole. There's also a core black "SPLY-350" branding across a scorching hot core red stripe on both sides. These dropped in November 2016 and retailed at $220. Add more sauce to your sneaker collection and buy now on StockX.

name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 MX Oat

details.description:
The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 MX Oat features a yellow, orange, and blue swirl-patterned Primeknit upper with a mesh side stripe and yellow heel tab. From there, a semi-translucent Boost midsole and pale yellow rope laces complete the design.

The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 MX Oat released in October of 2021 and retailed for $220.

name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Core Black White

details.description:
The adidas Yeezy 350 V2 Core Black White features a simple black Primeknit upper with "SPLY-350" text on a cream side stripe. From there, responsive Boost technology in the sole offers comfort and support.

The adidas Yeezy 350 V2 Core Black White released in December of 2016, and restocked in March of 2022 for $220.
